reason.tex:
%text The first question is, what is $\left(f\circ f \right)(x)$? % \begin{align}
\left(f\circ f \right)(x) &= f \left(\, f(x) \,\right) \\ &= f \left(\frac{1}{x} \right) = \dfrac{1}{\frac{1}{x}} = x \end{align} %text And so, if $ \left(f\circ f \right)(x) = x$, then \[ \quad\qquad \ddx \left(f\circ f \right)(x) = 1 \] %
